website_summaries.verdict: Created with professional weight lifters in mind, this rugged pair delivers superior support and durability. A solid choice if you need extended coverage.
pros: Heavy duty construction with triple reinforced nylon stitching can take a serious beating without showing signs of wear and tear
Firm fit hugs the knees for reliable support
High density neoprene provides warmth and compression, reducing discomfort during heavy workouts
Added length for hamstring and calf coverage
cons: Can be difficult to get on and off

customer_reviews.title: The best you can get
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I just upgraded from the L as they were too small. These stay up and in place and hold up to the washing machine. I like that I can pull them down between exercises as our home gym can get hot and the thick neoprene (any type) can get uncomfortable at times.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: Fantasic!
customer_reviews.text: The XL's fit my 17" knees perfectly, but with enough tightness to provide good support. If you want wrap-like tightness, go with Large. I love the quality so far. I've been wearing them for almost 2 months and they still look brand new. My skin gets pretty sweaty and they seem to stay put. Wish they were a little less costly, but compared to other major brands I cannot complain.
customer_reviews.author: Nunya Business

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: Great support. My knees have been giving me a few problems lately and these absolutely stabilize them and have got me back to making gains. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: My husband has knee problems and he has loved having these. They protect his knee area so well with a lot of support and he is able to have more intense workouts with these. A must have for anyone who has any knee problems. They are tight without being too restrictive.
customer_reviews.author: DeDe

customer_reviews.title: More confidence using these
customer_reviews.text: Follow up video helped greatly to show how to effectively put them on. They made a huge difference for squats and deadlifts
customer_reviews.author: DrLSG

customer_reviews.title: Quality item and great follow up.
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is great, checking in right after my order to let me know they can exchange for a different size if they don't fit as expected etc. I used the sizing chart that they have posted and I love they way they fit. The fit is very supportive and comfortable. I used the technique they sent me to put them on and it worked great. Way better than just pulling them on without folding the top and bottom. So far so good. The quality seems like they should last a long time but I will have to give them time to know for certain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Knee warmth and support for those heavy squats
customer_reviews.text: They're super comfortable, and thick enough to give your knees good support. They allow me to squat more frequently without any built up stress on my knees. I also need less time to warm up. The best part is that they also stay in place most of the time thanks to the design. Stoic stuff is great, can't recommend them enough, especially at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W

customer_reviews.title: Solid pair of knee sleeves.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these a couple days ago and am thoroughly surprised with the quick shipping, customer service, and overall quality of these sleeves. These are comparable to my buddies $70 knee sleeves. I definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Supportive
customer_reviews.text: My knees felt great during and after squats (prior injuries). The support is great. They look and feel durable, only time will tell, will update if anything changes. They didn't require that I keep pulling them up or anything. They stayed put, easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Victor J. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality - doesn't hold up - slides down leg then bunches up. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: JR smith

customer_reviews.title: Not USPA approved
customer_reviews.text: Item was perfect although they’re not USPA approved so we couldn’t use them. No problem with the product though we should have done more research.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Heath

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Better built and fitting than my Strong knee sleeves, and at a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: They are great. They didn't slip even one bit
customer_reviews.text: Used it for back squats and front squats. They are great. They didn't slip even one bit, were very easy to put on and take off, didn't feel any bunching bothering me, and they've kept my knees really warm. No more creaky knees. Pay a lot of attention to sizing, though. I measured my knees at 40cm and bought the XL. When I've put these on the first time I thanked myself for choosing the correct size, for L would be too tight. Finally, I didn't receive a cent to write this.
customer_reviews.author: Murelli

customer_reviews.title: Great fit great support
customer_reviews.text: Works great feels great warmer than I expected but I’ve never had a pair before. The support is great. The customer follow up was awesome and had an awesome personal touch
customer_reviews.author: CRod

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and compression.
customer_reviews.text: Quite simply the best knee sleeves I've ever handled. The quality is amazing, and the compression is excellent. I purchased a size down from my measurements so they were a struggle to get on the first time, but I followed the instructions provided on the packaging (and in the email I received) and they are worth the effort. In fact, I ordered the elbow sleeves immediately after I felt and saw the quality of these.
customer_reviews.author: MurderEthic

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knee sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I bought some knee sleeves from the MCX but they weren't cutting it. These are way better.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Eliminated Knee Pain from Heavy Squats
customer_reviews.text: I've been following Starting Strength and progressing through the first phase of the Texas method. My knee started really bothering me. Within a week of using these the knee pain has all but disappeared. I measured 42cm at my knee and therefore ordered the X-Large size. Fit is good, not too tight, easy to get on and off, and I can leave them on the whole workout and forget about them.
customer_reviews.author: mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but buy a 1 size smaller
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable, but they run a little big. I ordered the Xl’s and I don’t think I should be able to pull them away from my leg as easily as they do. I didn’t figure that out until I used them a few times. Wish I could return for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Rennie

customer_reviews.title: amazing product!@ good for the price
customer_reviews.text: only tested it out 3 times, comparable to SBD without the crazy prices, highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try.
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. These seem to be comparable to SBD. Materials seem high quality. I have only got to use them once so far. I hit some heavy squats in them a couple of days ago and they offered excellent support, were comfortable and seemed to offer a little "bounce" out of the hole. I can't speak for the durability yet. If they hold up, I will say I got a hell of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Knee Sleeve for weightlifting and powerlifting.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Came in two days. Fit is perfect. Provide great knee support and also work as shin guards for deadlifts. Would definitely reccomend to fellow lifting buddies. They are super tight and wont add weight to your squat but give good compression and help get out of the bottom of the lift. A LOT tighter than rehbands or other knee sleeves that just provide light support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They fit snug and go on easy once you learn the technique
customer_reviews.text: These keep everything tight, warm, and quiet. They fit snug and go on easy once you learn the technique. Best sleeves for knees that I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great! I use them at crossfit for just lifting- ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I use them at crossfit for just lifting- they are very stiff- but that's what I wanted. I feel too springy to run or do a WOD that isn't lifting, but that's just my preference.- but these are wonderful quality. I'm very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: liz

customer_reviews.title: Strong support
customer_reviews.text: Saved me during my leg lifts. I feel more confident at my low point within my squats.
customer_reviews.author: Craigs

customer_reviews.title: If you lift heavy, buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I squatted 315 today with them on, and they are very comfortable and supportive!
customer_reviews.author: jbmizner

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The knee braces are very stout, high quality, and increased my squat capabilities. They make my knees feel very springy and well protected for heavy lift days. I am very impressed with the quality to value on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fuller

customer_reviews.title: these are probably the best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price, these are probably the best bang for your buck! Feel just as good as Rehbands, at half of the price! Size fits like a glove & they're holding up pretty well so far compared to old knee sleeves I've had!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Moronese

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Used them yesterday and I could tell a huge difference when going heavy. Keep my knees warm the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Icard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Sleeves! Great Quality & Great Customer Service From Sharon! :) THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Muzza

customer_reviews.title: Its not super comfortable but I think that’s fine.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good set of sleeves and they feel good, just aren’t something I’d wanna wear all the time. But great for the lifts
customer_reviews.author: Maurice Pete

customer_reviews.title: These sleeves are awesome. I was using fabric stretch sleeves before and ...
customer_reviews.text: These sleeves are awesome. I was using fabric stretch sleeves before and these are a huge step up. They're a lot thicker which makes me feel much more confident and stronger with these. My knees stay warm between sets of squats. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Knee sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Like that they're longer than others and that they stay in place. Went with an XL because of my calf measurement just wish it was tapered more by the knee. Overall they give good support.
customer_reviews.author: John Bobersky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these knee sleeves.Very thick and supportive for powerlifting.Highky recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Pegi Miskey

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised...have knee pain that limits me at times the sleeves work to me like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Al Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: First set of knee wraps I've ever used and They did not disappoint. Fits very snug and provides a great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely phenomenal!!! First set of knee wraps I've ever used and They did not disappoint. Fits very snug and provides a great, comfortable, feel while working out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its good quality and works
customer_reviews.text: I like the confoet. I use it for squat days
customer_reviews.author: Terrell Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of sleeves
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of sleeves just make sure you are aware of your size
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jones

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for making a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I think the real star of the show is the knee sleeves. They have helped me regain the ability to squat with more than my body weight. Thanks for making a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Burress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these knee sleeves! Wish I would have purchased them sooner and the price is very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great knee sleeves, great support, amazing quality for the price. Highly recommend to any gym goer!!
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Fit nicely! I had knee surgery a year ago and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely! I had knee surgery a year ago and these allow me to squat deep with no knee irritation!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made the world of difference in my balance and knee support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the knee sleeves. Very comfortable and gave me the knee support I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, knees felt much better after using these sleeves during squats.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping the best after multiple knee sleeves have disappointed me
customer_reviews.text: TOO LARGE. I was hoping the best after multiple knee sleeves have disappointed me, with only SBD, not failing. I read the reviews stating they were comparable to SBD knee sleeves in SIZE and durability. I don't question it's durability, but I was greatly disappointed that it was too big after doing measurements on my legs to confirm. Go a size down, is there possibility to exchange for a smaller size?
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fang

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! I've been using them for about a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I've been using them for about a month now and am very happy with these. By far the best knee sleeves I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit Great, received on time, measured per instructions. These seem to be great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! ,,My father loved this product ..Sturdy and easy on/off access ..thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Legit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to save some money compared to the ones I've seen in stores. Honestly great quality, feel and look. Definitely recommend they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Josh V

product_meta.title: Stoic Knee Sleeves for Powerlifting - 7mm Thick Neoprene Sleeve for Bodybuilding, Weight Lifting Best for Squats, Cross Training, Strongman Professional Quality & Ultra Heavy Duty (Pair)
feature_bullets: NEXT LEVEL LEG TRAINING - Knee sleeves purpose built to hit heavier weights, higher reps, and more intensity! Specially designed for optimal performance & support for driving increased stimulus and progression. Experience new personal records while reducing or eliminating knee pain! SOLD AS A PAIR.

KNEE PAIN REDUCTION & PROTECTION - Holds knee compression through the full range of motion. Unlike other sleeves designed for comfort, these sleeves are designed to add support, warmth, and compression during leg workouts. The added heat retention and compression provided by our unique ultra-high density 7MM thick neoprene can dramatically reduce aches and pains during exercise.

HIGHEST GRADE MATERIALS, HEAVIEST DUTY - Built to outlast ANY other knee sleeves on the market using patent-pending construction methods. Our neoprene knee sleeves are 100% guaranteed to outperform and out-last even the most expensive knee sleeves on the market. You'll feel the difference!

UNBREAKABLE CONSTRUCTION, GUARANTEED - Our patent pending triple reinforced seam offers the strongest stitch ever used on a knee sleeve. The use of the heaviest grade tear resistant materials used both inside and out makes these knee sleeves built to last. We're confident you'll absolutely love our Knee Sleeves - or any of our other products! If somehow you aren't 100% satisfied, just contact us!

EXTRA LENGTH, COMPLETE COVERAGE - Every size sleeve comes in full 30CM length for maximum coverage and support. Our knee sleeves are designed to add warmth and compression through the knee joint and surrounding muscles. NOTE: Due to the length and strength of materials used, tight sleeves may be very difficult to apply. Please see application and removal directions.
